DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine effect , term fitness blood parameter , fatigue level , quality life , individualized prescriptive exercise intervention patient newly diagnose acute relapse myeloid lymphoblastic leukemia undergo chemotherapy . Secondary - Determine feasibility develop exercise program patient . - Assess change cardiovascular endurance , muscular strength , select blood parameter , response inflammatory protein exercise patient . - Evaluate fatigue , depression , quality life patient . OUTLINE : This pilot study . Patients participate individualize prescriptive exercise intervention 3 4 time per week 6 week ( 4 week hospital , 2 week home ) . Exercise begin concurrently first course ( induction therapy ) chemotherapy . Each exercise session consist 3-5 minute light stretch ( stretch component ) , 5-10 minute cycle recumbent bicycle ( cardiorespiratory component ) , 5-15 minute resistance train include hand dumbbell , exercise tubing , rubber band , fit ball ( resistance training component ) , 5-10 minute abdominal exercise ( core muscle component ) . Quality life , fatigue , depression assess baseline weekly study intervention . Blood sample collect baseline week 3 6 cytokine analysis .
